DataElement.preferredName: Patient Adverse Event Associated with Surgery and Intra-Operative Injury Recovered or Resolved Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._An adverse event associated with surgery or an intra-operative injury._One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome that indicates that the event has improved or recuperated._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Adverse Event Associated with Surgery and Intra-Operative Injury Recovered or Resolved Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: No Value Exists:One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome that indicates that the event has improved or recuperated.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.longName: Adverse Event Associated with Surgery and Intra-Operative Injury
Concepts.definition: An adverse event associated with surgery or an intra-operative injury.
One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome that indicates that the event has improved or recuperated.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient recovered fro
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient recovered from all acute effects of prior surgical intervention?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is Radiation therapy and Optune device application start date at least 5 days after the date of a tumor biopsy if obtained?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient >= 28 days from any prior surgery at the time of study enrollment (with the exception of minor dental and dermatological procedures)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient fully recovered from any prior surgery?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2023.9.15 Updated def for 'No Value Exists'. ak
